response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. This product is not just any commodity; it's an investment that could potentially revolutionize the way you operate and achieve your goals. Given its unique features and the value it offers, I propose a price of $850,000 for this exceptional opportunity. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 850000}
